message.body: Johnnnn! I heard you're coming to Philly this Saturday but I have work. Booooo! :( How long will you be in the city?
Hey Sammy. Yeah, I'll be dropping by Saturday night.
Oh nooo. I've got work Sunday afternoon and then I have plans for Sunday night. Waugh! This stinks, I miss you. :(
That sucks. :[ I'm not sure when I'll be in the city again. I'll try to let you know earlier next time. Then we can hang out.
